definitions.definition: A mythological creature generally depicted as a bird-of-prey with the head of a maiden, a face pale with hunger and long claws on her hands personifying the destructive power of storm winds.
One who is rapacious or ravenous ; an extortioner .
The European moor buzzard or marsh harrier ( Circus aeruginosus ).
A large and powerful double-crested, short-winged American eagle ( Harpia harpyja ).

main_definition: ( mythology ) A mythological creature generally depicted as a bird-of-prey with the head of a maiden, a face pale with hunger and long claws on her hands personifying the destructive power of storm winds.
secondary_definitions: One who is rapacious or ravenous ; an extortioner .
The European moor buzzard or marsh harrier ( Circus aeruginosus ).
A large and powerful double-crested, short-winged American eagle ( Harpia harpyja ).
